Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Requires hospitals to ask patients if they have a disability that requires accommodation under The Americans with Disabilities Act
Summary: Requires hospitals to ask patients if they have a disability that requires accommodation under The Americans with Disabilities Act on patient intake forms and what reasonable accommodations are required.
LawCode: Amd ยง2803-t, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring hospitals to ask patients if they have a disability that requires accommodation under The Americans with Disabilities Act
